commands.description: Ask a question about mental health and receive a concise, informative answer.

parameters.description: A question related to mental health.
parameters.name: question
parameters.title: question

samplePrompts.text: I'm trying to help with stress
How do I overcome the grief of losing a loved one?
My sleep is affecting my work and life what can I do?
I need to help my child with anxiety
I'm feeling anxious today what can I do to help?

commands.title: Ask Simpatico

commands.description: Find articles on mental health topics, filtered by date, category, and type.

parameters.description: Choose a category such as ADHD, Anxiety, Depression, etc.
parameters.name: category
parameters.title: Category

parameters.description: Sort by: 'viewed' (last viewed by you), 'popular' or 'new'
parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.title: Sort by

parameters.description: Articles viewed or published from given date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.title: Date From

parameters.description: Articles viewed or published before given date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
parameters.name: dateBefore
parameters.title: Date Before

samplePrompts.text: Show me some articles that help with team morale
What are some ways to help remote workers with their well-being?

commands.title: Articles

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.title: Date From

parameters.description: Reports published before given date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)
parameters.name: dateBefore
parameters.title: Date Before

samplePrompts.text: Show me the latest company report for wellness
Show me the wellness for my organisation for the last 7 days
Show me the wellness report for the first week of February

commands.title: Reports

longDescription:
Simpatico is an AI-driven platform designed to improve employee well-being, enhance productivity, and foster a positive work culture. It offers a wide range of mental health support features, including mood tracking, stress management techniques, guided meditations, and self-help resources. Developed in consultation with renowned clinical psychologist Dr Simon Kinsella, Simpatico not only enables individuals to better understand and manage their mental health challenges but also provides actionable insights and data to help organizations understand and develop programs to support their staff's mental health and well-being needs.
Transform mental health support with the power of Simpatico inside of Microsoft Teams, Outlook, and Microsoft 365 Copilot

**Microsoft Teams notifications bot**
The Simpatico bot will send you relevant notifications in Teams, as well as access to information and features of Simpatico in chat.

**Microsoft Teams personal app integration**
In the personal app, access and view the features of Simpatico app, right within Teams.

**Microsoft Teams messaging extension**
Add information and features to all of your projects, meetings and workshops. Search and ask Simpatico for information, tips & techniques about mental health directly in Teams, share content in teams.

**Personal app integration in Microsoft Outlook and Microsoft 365 Copilot (web app and Windows app)**
In the personal app, access knowledge tools, tips and techniques and self assessment just as you would in the Simpatico web app, right within Outlook and Microsoft 365 Copilot.

**Messaging extension in Microsoft Outlook (web app and Windows app)**
Add Simpatico content to email communications. Search and ask Simpatico for information, tips & techniques about mental health directly in Outlook by using the Simpatico messaging extension.

**Whats new**
Simpatico works with Microsoft 365 Copilot.
Search articles about Anxiety, that I viewed last month in Simpatico 

Manage access to Teams apps across Microsoft 365 [here](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/MicrosoftTeams/manage-third-party-teams-apps). 
This application requires an active subscription with Simpatico. To create an account please send an email to support@simpaticoteams.com. 
Please report any inappropriate content found within this app via [support.simpaticoteams.com](https://support.simpaticoteams.com)
shortDescription: Support the well-being of your organisation.
